attributes.action: recognise Heather Brooke in the Honours List for services to the public.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Heather Brooke's work has exposed the depths to which our MP's have sunk in their expenses claims. We call upon the Prime Minister to recognise, in the traditional manner, the great public good she has achieved

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
